title: Kim Kardashian West Goes Back to Blonde on Snapchat - Vogue
text: Did Kim Kardashian West Just Go Blonde Again? February 18, 2017 2:18 AM Photo: Courtesy of Kim Kardashian West / Kim Kardashian (Snapchat) Today is Paris Hilton’s 36th birthday—and Kim Kardashian West chose to honor her onetime best friend by sharing, of all things, one of her signature beauty transformations on Snapchat. Standing in front of a dressing-room mirror in a plunging bra top and glittering choker, Kardashian West revealed that she had exchanged yesterday’s hip-grazing Cher hair for a tousled blonde lob. It was a head-turning look that she first debuted two years ago at Balmain , when she stepped out front row alongside an equally bleached Jared Leto . Though fans may find themselves wondering whether Kardashian West actually took the platinum plunge or simply borrowed one of sister Kylie Jenner’s trademark wigs, the high-impact message was clear. "Happy birthday Paris Hilton!” she wrote—but the subtext read, “look at me now.” In This Story: Kim Kardashian West Recommended For You
